about_the_game:
"Mana Sisters" is a spellbinding 2D puzzle game that whisks you away to a realm of diverse magical characters, spanning from the mystical healers of the icy peaks of Moholoth to the enigmatic shamans of the Forsaken Dräe Forest. This enchanting journey invites you to match pairs of cards, revealing images of unique spellcasters and nurturing your memory skills through each challenging level.

Immerse yourself in this magical world, appreciating the artistically crafted illustrations of mages, shamans, necromancers, healers, and more. The captivating gameplay, designed for one-handed ease, coupled with a soothing soundtrack, delivers an unforgettable gaming experience. Every element, from the intuitive game mechanics to the stunning backgrounds, ensures that "Mana Sisters" leaves a lasting impression and keeps you coming back for more.

KEY FEATURES:

One-handed playability for easy engagement.
A diverse range of art styles, representing various magical characters.
Intuitive gameplay designed to challenge and enrich your memory skills.
A serene, immersive soundtrack to enhance the magical ambiance.
Beautifully crafted illustrations of a variety of magical beings, each with their unique allure.
Stunning backgrounds that transport you to different magical realms.
A memorable journey filled with magical wonders.
Steam Achievements, to mark your progress and accomplishments.
